title: Team Nova LFM (Gold - Plat)
body:
Looking for dedicated players that want to improve mentally and mechanically. Players willing to put time and effort to reach their goals as a team. Practices will be around 5 - 11 PM PST, depending on the team schedule with at least 2 - 3 practices weekly. With hopefully joining tournaments in the future. All i ask is for good communication, willing to learn, and positive attitude. (Toxic attitude is an instant kick) 
Top: Open
Jungle : Open
Mid : Open
ADC : Open

Please fill this out before adding me
Rank Soloq:
Rank Flex: 
Age:
Role: 
Availability:
Discord?:

replies.body:
Rank Soloq: plat 4 (just dropped from plat 3 rip)
Rank Flex: none
Age: 18
Role: mid/top
Availability: it'll be summer soon so generally free
Discord?: yes

Discord?:yes
